>::Fidgit::
>
>She was in stasis lock in the hallway where Falcore left her when the Preds
>were attacking the ship.  Her chest wounds were to extensive for her
>internal healing systems to heal.  She was laying in a puddle of her own
>mech fluid.  She heard the noise of the predacons storming the ship
>somewhere in the back of her mind.  She couldn't hold on any longer.  She
>slipped away into nothingness.  Her spark joined with the Matrix.
>
>Please put Fidgit on the deceased list.
